w:r.w:t: RAJABIO - Pupuk Organik Cair (Liquid Organic Fertilizer)
RAJABIO is a legally registered and certified organic product in Indonesia:
RAJABIO is a liquid organic fertilizer formulated from selected natural ingredients and processed using
It is designed to fertilize the soil and is equipped with macro and micro nutrients that are easily absorbed by plants. It provides tangible results when applied to crops.
Based on the test results presented in the company profile (Page 36).
Ensures the product is safe for the environment and consumption.
Ensures no harmful pathogens are present.
Increases soil fertility by providing additional C-Organic input.
Increases plant resistance against pests and diseases.
Improves the physical, chemical, and biological properties of the soil.
Acts as a source of energy and food for beneficial soil microbes (fertilizing microbes and disease-controlling microbes).
Provides essential macro and micro nutrients needed by plants.
Improves the overall quality of the harvest.
5 ml RAJABIO per 1 liter of water.
5 ml RAJABIO per 1 liter of water.
Prices found in the catalog are subject to change, but this is the listed price in the provided company profile.
Katalisator ketersediaan unsur hara makro dan mikro
Mendorong kinerja mikroorganisme tanah secara maksimal
